body.name: SUPERFLO 600W Macerator Pump Toilet Macerating Upflush Toilet System for Basement | Silent & Power Modern Toilet Bowl with Toilet Tank & Pump for Sink, Toilet & Bathtub
body.stockDetail: Only 9 left in stock - order soon.
features: Powerful 360-degree Flush---Wastewater from the toilet, sink or tub automatically activates the crush of the 600W pump in our top flush toilet system and is pumped to V32.8 and H263 feet for homes with low water pressure, narrow pipes or basements.

AC Ventilation---There is an activated charcoal cotton sheet which will help reduce odor after using the toilet, and you can also add your pipe to connect to your home's ventilation system to improve your overall comfort after using the toilet.

Dual Flush Button---Rear outlet toilet has two water-saving buttons to choose from, 0.8 GPF and 1.6 GPF, which saves almost 0.35 GPF of water than traditional toilets, so it saves household water from a great extent.

Easy installation---The installation process of the toilet is quite simple as you don't have to break the floor to install any pipes. We also include installation instructions, so please contact us if you have any questions about the process.

Professional After-sale Service---Our after-sales service team of power flush toilet has been committed to providing you with reliable after-sales service. Please write down your questions or concerns or email us, and we will respond within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful Motor 600 Watt motor brings a powerful force to crush the dirt while the powerful motor quickly flushes the dirt out upwards. 4 Water Inlets Upflush Toilet for Basement designed to extract waste from toilets, showers, kitchen sinks, and or washing machines, which is ideal for basements or other areas where the toilet is below the main line. Sharp Blades Macerator Toilet's Reamer for effective crushing of dirt, preventing clogs and backups in your basement bathroom, ensuring your bathroom stays clean!
Compact Toilet Macerating Toilet One Piece Toilet Basement Toilet Upflow Toilet System With Pump ✓ ✓ ✓ Two Piece ✓ ✓ One Piece ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product and Awesome Customer Service.
reviews.reviewText: We Purchased the Superflo upflush Toilet 600W back in June or July because we are putting a bathroom in the basement. The toilet is working great but while my husband was doing something to the toilet he drop the lid on the toilet and broke it. I contacted the company to see how much a lid would be and they send me a new lid at no costs to us, it was our fault the lid got broken but they still sent a new one. NOW THAT'S GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!! Thank you Superflo!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Recently installed this and even added a drain from our sink. Install went smoothly and it works great.L

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the way it works. We reconstructed the garage into a studio and this toilet works so well. It's a little noisy but I understand it because it destroys everything before flushing it into city pipes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: The pump on this unit is VERY quiet and efficient. Truly amazing as I have a different unit in another rental home and it is loud. The unit arrived in apparent decent condition according to the outside of the box. However, not visible to the eye, the inside of the bowl was cracked and leaking on the floor from the inside. Superflow was quick to respond, Yvette, and sent a replacement toilet base within a week. I am very pleased with that response and the performance, thus far, with the product. Nice job Superflo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fill Valve Failed
reviews.reviewText: This toilet failed after having it installed for only FOUR months with very little use. Specifically, the fill valve isn't shutting off which is causing the tank to overflow. All over our wood floors. Tempted to just pull the whole toilet. Very disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good-but tank is now leaking
reviews.reviewText: I swapped the fill valve out to a standard 7/8 so I can use an added bidet and standard lines. As for the quietness of this product, it's more noisy than I could have imagined, like a jet ramping up it's engine. I used 1-1/4 pipe for 30' then upsized to 1-1/2 per instructions, I went up and over my roof to hook to clean out outside. Not crazy how little the bowl fills with water but it works. Update: pump tank is leaking from bottom, not a lot but still worried if tank will explode one day.Update: The leak was coming from the plug that is used when your not using one of the inlets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good reviews
reviews.reviewText: Purchased and had problem with bolt to hold toilet seat. Customer service reached out and help me fix the problem. Everything looks great and is working great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best solution for adding a Toilet after house is built.
reviews.reviewText: Real Easy setup. Had a shed that had a Sewage connection but was about 10 feet shy of where I wanted the toilet. Had plumbers come tell me they could install a regular toilet for $5,000-8,000. Found this toilet and saved myself a little over $4,000 after my extra supplies I went out and bought.It's a little loud but when you consider what's all involved and what it does in such a small factor & being an outside toilet it's well worth it.Came packaged greatly, no chance of breaking unless dropped off a truck.
